channel.title: Brand on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Brand on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Brand
item.description: As time passes Clouds cover the heat Rays of passion Stir and dance Form Breeds And I just rest Sifting These layers Grinding Passing Flight beckons Patience wears Something of a clock Cloak. Normal shadows Flight by And the sun That once was Echoes brilliantly Bonding Brotherhood And within deep Watered wells Lies my starry fate.
